Detailed Description

Class for objects that provide chip summary metrics.

Todo:
AW: This is a bit of a mess because we had to add in after the fact /// the need to know up front what metrics will be available. Originally /// the list of available metrics (eg getMetricNames) was only available /// after the analysis was run.

This is basically an interface with some helper methods for exposing per-chip metrics to various reporters.
